text: Rae Bareli (रायबरेली) is a constituency of the Uttar Pradesh Legislative Assembly covering the city of Rae Bareli in the Rae Bareli district of Uttar Pradesh, India. Rae Bareli is one of five assembly constituencies in the Rae Bareli (Lok Sabha constituency). Since 2008, this assembly constituency is numbered 180 amongst 403 constituencies. Currently this seat belongs to Aditi Singh who won in last Assembly election of 2017 Uttar Pradesh Lagislative Elections, as Congress candidate, defeating Bahujan Samaj Party candidate Shabaj Khan by a margin of more than 90,000 votes. In May 2020, Aditi Singh was suspended from Congress Party for indiscipline amidst rumours that she was getting close to BJP. https://www.timesnownews.com/india/article/congress- suspends-aditi-singh-from-womens-wing-after-raebareli-mla-slammed-party-for- fraud/594972 ==Vidhan Sabha Members== {|class = "wikitable" |- !
